name: chrome-devtools
title: Chrome DevTools
description: Control and inspect a live Chrome browser with full access to Chrome DevTools for automation, debugging, and performance analysis.
about:
## Chrome DevTools MCP

`chrome-devtools-mcp` lets your coding agent control and inspect a live Chrome browser. It acts as an MCP server, giving your AI assistant access to the full power of Chrome DevTools for reliable automation, in-depth debugging, and performance analysis.

### Key Features

- **Browser Automation**: Click, fill forms, hover, and drag elements.
- **Navigation**: Manage multiple pages, navigate URLs, and wait for content.
- **Debugging**: Evaluate scripts, inspect console logs, and take screenshots or accessibility snapshots.
- **Performance**: Record traces and extract actionable performance insights (CWV scores).
- **Network**: Analyze network requests and responses.

### Getting Started

To add this MCP server to Scooter, run:

```bash
scooter add chrome-devtools
```

By default, it will start a new Chrome instance. You can also connect to an existing browser using the `--browser-url` or `--autoConnect` flags in the runtime configuration.

tools.name: click
tools.title: Click Element
tools.description: Clicks on the provided element using its unique identifier from a snapshot.

uid.description: The uid of an element on the page from the page content snapshot

dblClick.description: Set to true for double clicks. Default is false.

includeSnapshot.description: Whether to include a snapshot in the response. Default is false.

tools.name: drag
tools.title: Drag and Drop
tools.description: Drags an element from one location and drops it onto another element.

from_uid.description: The uid of the element to drag

to_uid.description: The uid of the element to drop into

includeSnapshot.description: Whether to include a snapshot in the response. Default is false.

tools.name: fill
tools.title: Fill Input
tools.description: Type text into an input, textarea, or select an option from a <select> element.

uid.description: The uid of an element on the page from the page content snapshot

includeSnapshot.description: Whether to include a snapshot in the response. Default is false.

tools.name: fill_form
tools.title: Fill Form
tools.description: Fill out multiple form elements at once using a list of element identifiers and values.

elements.description: Elements from snapshot to fill out.

includeSnapshot.description: Whether to include a snapshot in the response. Default is false.

tools.name: handle_dialog
tools.title: Handle Dialog
tools.description: Accepts or dismisses a browser dialog (alert, confirm, prompt).

action.description: Whether to dismiss or accept the dialog

promptText.description: Optional prompt text to enter into the dialog.

tools.name: hover
tools.title: Hover Element
tools.description: Hovers the mouse pointer over the provided element.

uid.description: The uid of an element on the page from the page content snapshot

includeSnapshot.description: Whether to include a snapshot in the response. Default is false.

tools.name: press_key
tools.title: Press Key
tools.description: Press a key or key combination (e.g., 'Enter', 'Control+A').

key.description: A key or a combination (e.g., 'Enter', 'Control+A'). Modifiers: Control, Shift, Alt, Meta

includeSnapshot.description: Whether to include a snapshot in the response. Default is false.

tools.name: upload_file
tools.title: Upload File
tools.description: Uploads a local file through a provided file input element.

filePath.description: The local path of the file to upload

uid.description: The uid of the file input element or an element that will open file chooser

includeSnapshot.description: Whether to include a snapshot in the response. Default is false.

tools.name: close_page
tools.title: Close Page
tools.description: Closes a browser page by its ID.

pageId.description: The ID of the page to close.

tools.name: list_pages
tools.title: List Pages
tools.description: Returns a list of all open pages in the browser.

tools.name: navigate_page
tools.title: Navigate Page
tools.description: Navigates the current page to a URL, or goes back/forward/reloads.

tools.name: new_page
tools.title: New Page
tools.description: Creates a new browser page and navigates to the specified URL.

url.description: URL to load in a new page.

tools.name: select_page
tools.title: Select Page
tools.description: Selects a page to be the context for future tool calls.

pageId.description: The ID of the page to select.

tools.name: wait_for
tools.title: Wait For Text
tools.description: Waits for specific text to appear on the selected page.

text.description: Text to appear on the page

tools.name: emulate
tools.title: Emulate Features
tools.description: Emulates CPU throttling, network conditions, geolocation, user agent, or viewport.

tools.name: resize_page
tools.title: Resize Page
tools.description: Resizes the selected page's window to the specified dimensions.

tools.name: performance_analyze_insight
tools.title: Analyze Performance Insight
tools.description: Provides detailed info on a specific Performance Insight from a trace.

tools.name: performance_start_trace
tools.title: Start Performance Trace
tools.description: Starts recording a performance trace on the selected page.

tools.name: performance_stop_trace
tools.title: Stop Performance Trace
tools.description: Stops the active performance trace recording.

tools.name: get_network_request
tools.title: Get Network Request
tools.description: Gets details of a network request by ID or the currently selected one.

tools.name: list_network_requests
tools.title: List Network Requests
tools.description: Lists all network requests for the selected page since last navigation.

tools.name: evaluate_script
tools.title: Evaluate Script
tools.description: Executes a JavaScript function in the context of the selected page.

tools.name: get_console_message
tools.title: Get Console Message
tools.description: Retrieves a specific console message by its ID.

tools.name: list_console_messages
tools.title: List Console Messages
tools.description: Lists all console messages for the selected page.

tools.name: take_screenshot
tools.title: Take Screenshot
tools.description: Takes a screenshot of the page or a specific element.

tools.name: take_snapshot
tools.title: Take Snapshot
tools.description: Takes a text/accessibility snapshot of the page with unique element IDs.
